elements.name: question1
elements.title: How many train tickets do you need to order for the two sports days?

elements.name: question2
elements.title: How many day tickets for skiers and snowboarders do you need to order?

elements.name: question3
elements.title: How many apprentices will be in Engelberg on Monday?

elements.name: question4
elements.title: How many skates need to be rented so that everyone who has signed up can play ice hockey?

elements.name: question5
elements.title: Engelberg is located in the canton of Obwalden, but is surrounded by the canton of Nidwalden. How many apprentices do not come from these two cantons?

elements.name: question6
elements.title: How many cantons do the apprentices come from in total?
elements.correctAnswer: From six cantons: NW, OW, UR, SZ, LU and ZG.

elements.name: question7
elements.title: How many apprentices do not take part in the sports day, but work at the training company?
